verses.text: Like cold water to a weary soul is good news from a distant land.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:25
rsbNotes.text: 25:25 For the form of this proverb, see note on v. 11.

verses.text: Like a muddied spring or a polluted well is a righteous man who gives way to the wicked.
It is not good to eat too much honey, nor is it honorable to seek one's own honor.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:26
rsbNotes.text: 25:26 righteous man. See note 8:18.
